chunk:
Foxie Cosmetics Doused Face Toner (2020 formulation)

Brand: Foxie Cosmetics

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: : Evian Mineral Water, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (certified organic filet of aloe vera), Glycerin (vegetable), hamamelis virginiana (un-distilled witch hazel) extract, citric aci

extract, citric acid, citrus grandis (grapefruit) seed extract, and tocopheryl (vitamin E) acetate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf extract, Salix Alba (Willow) bark extract, Arnica Montana (Arnica flower) extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Extract, Prunus Avium (Cherry) kernel oil, Laminaria

rnel oil, Laminaria (Algae) extract, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Fruit Water

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
